note.p: Career: Assistant Professor of Chemistry, University of Edinburgh; Jacksonian Professor of Natural Experimental Philosophy, University of Cambridge (1875); Fullerian Professor of Chemistry, Royal Institution, London (1877)
Medals/Prizes: Rumford Medal 1894; Davy Medal 1909; Copley Medal 1916
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1926 vol 111 pp xiii-xxiii, plate
References: Sir Brian Pippard, 'Siegfried Ruhemann (1859-1943), FRS 1914-1923' in NR 1993 vol 47 pp 271-276
John Shorter, 'Humphrey Owen Jones, FRS (1878-1912), Chemist and Mountaineer' in NR 1978-9 vol 33 pp 261-277
J S Rowlinson, 'A national treasure house. 'The common purposes of life': science and society at the Royal Institution of Great Britain ed Frank A J L James ' in NR 2004 vol 58 pp 105-106
